string.name: rp_list_custom
string.comment: The item for creating a customized recurrence

string.name: rp_picker_done
string.comment: Title of the button to close the recurrence picker and create the recurrence

string.name: rp_picker_cancel
string.comment: Title of the button to cancel the recurrence picker.

string.name: rp_picker_title
string.comment: Title of the recurrence picker window

string.name: rp_picker_subtitle_period
string.comment: Subtitle for choosing the frequency and period. Eg: 'Repeats every' 1 week

string.name: rp_picker_subtitle_setting
string.comment: Subtitle for choosing additional setting for weekly and monthly periods. Eg: 'Repeats on' the same day each month

string.name: rp_picker_subtitle_end
string.comment: Subtitle for choosing the end type. Eg: 'Ends' never, 'Ends' on date, 'Ends' after 1 occurence

string.name: rp_picker_end_never
string.comment: Option text for recurrence that never ends

string.name: rp_picker_end_date
string.comment:
Option text for recurrence that ends 'on' a date. Use the | character to indicate where the input is placed, optional if no text after input.
IMPORTANT: if the language has no prefix, i.e. the vertical bar is at the start of the text, then please leave a comment. There's an extra string needed to specify the entry in the recurrence picker *dialog* dropdown, which doesn't appear in Crowdin. This string will appear where the "On" word appears in the first screenshot.

plurals.name: rp_picker_end_count
plurals.comment:
Option text for recurrence that ends 'after X occurences'. Use the | character to indicate where the input is placed, optional if no text after input.
IMPORTANT: if the language has no prefix, i.e. the vertical bar is at the start of the text, then please leave a comment. There's an extra string needed to specify the entry in the recurrence picker *dialog* dropdown, which doesn't appear in Crowdin. This string will appear where the "After" word appears in the first three screenshots.

plurals.name: rp_picker_period_day
plurals.comment: Dropdown item for a daily recurrence [one] [other]

plurals.name: rp_picker_period_week
plurals.comment: Dropdown item for a weekly recurrence [one] [other]

plurals.name: rp_picker_period_month
plurals.comment: Dropdown item for a monthly recurrence [one] [other]

plurals.name: rp_picker_period_year
plurals.comment: Dropdown item for a yearly recurrence [one] [other]

string.name: rp_day_of_week_abbr1_sun
string.comment: 1-2 letters for a small day of week toggle button. (Sunday)

string.name: rp_day_of_week_abbr1_mon
string.comment: 1-2 letters for a small day of week toggle button. (Monday)

string.name: rp_day_of_week_abbr1_tue
string.comment: 1-2 letters for a small day of week toggle button. (Tuesday)

string.name: rp_day_of_week_abbr1_wed
string.comment: 1-2 letters for a small day of week toggle button. (Wednesday)

string.name: rp_day_of_week_abbr1_thu
string.comment: 1-2 letters for a small day of week toggle button. (Thursday)

string.name: rp_day_of_week_abbr1_fri
string.comment: 1-2 letters for a small day of week toggle button. (Friday)

string.name: rp_day_of_week_abbr1_sat
string.comment: 1-2 letters for a small day of week toggle button. (Saturday)

string-array.name: rp_days_of_week_abbr3
string-array.comment: Use in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc.

item.comment: Used in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc. 2-4 letters for enumerating days of the week. Use correct case. (Sunday)
Used in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc. 2-4 letters for enumerating days of the week. Use correct case. (Monday)
Used in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc. 2-4 letters for enumerating days of the week. Use correct case. (Tuesday)
Used in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc. 2-4 letters for enumerating days of the week. Use correct case. (Wednesday)
Used in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc. 2-4 letters for enumerating days of the week. Use correct case. (Thursday)
Used in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc. 2-4 letters for enumerating days of the week. Use correct case. (Friday)
Used in days of week enumeration, eg: weekly on 'Sun', 'Mon', etc. 2-4 letters for enumerating days of the week. Use correct case. (Saturday)

string.name: rp_format_none
string.comment: Text for no recurrence.

plurals.name: rp_format_day
plurals.comment: Text for a daily recurrence. The number argument is the frequency. [one] [other]

plurals.name: rp_format_week
plurals.comment: Text for a weekly recurrence. The number argument is the frequency.

plurals.name: rp_format_month
plurals.comment: Text for a monthly recurrence. The number argument is the frequency.

plurals.name: rp_format_year
plurals.comment: Text for a yearly recurrence. The number argument is the frequency.

string.name: rp_format_weekly_option
string.comment: The string argument is replaced with a list of days of week.

string.name: rp_format_weekly_all
string.comment: Used for a weekly recurrence that happens on every day of the week instead of a list of days.

resources.string: à tous les jours de la semaine

string.name: rp_format_monthly_same_day
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of each month

string.name: rp_format_monthly_last_day
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the last day of each month

string.name: rp_format_monthly_sun
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of the same week of each month. String argument is replaced by an ordinal number eg: 'third'. (Sunday)

string.name: rp_format_monthly_mon
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of the same week of each month. String argument is replaced by an ordinal number eg: 'third'. (Monday)

string.name: rp_format_monthly_tue
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of the same week of each month. String argument is replaced by an ordinal number eg: 'third'. (Tuesday)

string.name: rp_format_monthly_wed
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of the same week of each month. String argument is replaced by an ordinal number eg: 'third'. (Wednesday)

string.name: rp_format_monthly_thu
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of the same week of each month. String argument is replaced by an ordinal number eg: 'third'. (Thursday)

string.name: rp_format_monthly_fri
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of the same week of each month. String argument is replaced by an ordinal number eg: 'third'. (Friday)

string.name: rp_format_monthly_sat
string.comment: Used for a monthly recurrence that happens on the same day of the same week of each month. String argument is replaced by an ordinal number eg: 'third'. (Saturday)

item.comment: Used with strings rp_format_monthly_*. Use correct case and plural.
Used with strings rp_format_monthly_*. Use correct case and plural.
Used with strings rp_format_monthly_*. Use correct case and plural.
Used with strings rp_format_monthly_*. Use correct case and plural.
Used with strings rp_format_monthly_*. Use correct case and plural.

string.name: rp_format_end_date
string.comment: Goes after a recurrence that ends on a date. The string argument specifies this date.

plurals.name: rp_format_end_count
plurals.comment: Goes after a recurrence that ends after a number of events. The number argument specifies this number.
